metadata.title: CVE-2016-7986 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The GeoNetworking parser in tcpdump before 4.9.0 has a buffer overflow inprint-geonet.c, multiple functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7986` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.0-1ubuntu1~ubuntu16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.0-1ubuntu1~ubuntu16.04.1').
